tasks.task: Planting and caring for a cotton farm
subtasks: Observing the height and growth stages of cotton crops
Noting the readiness of the first crop and preparing for the second crop
Checking the timing and availability of rain for additional planting
Managing field access and navigation around crops and vegetation
Checking for insects and pests in the farmland
Identifying and harvesting organic crops (custard apple)
Filming and describing the farmland conditions and crops
Considering future videos on the farm
Observing camels near the farm area
